name: Early Release (jeefjerfy)
description:
You wake up, unsure of where you are or what is happening. Everything is dark, and as you struggle to orient yourself, a voice reaches out to you from the blackness...

Controls: WASD to move, J to interact, Escape to quit. Press Space to begin the game after launching.

This game was made over the week of 10/25/2020, the seventh in my deck of many games, where I try to make a game a week, every week, for a year.
